for a dog obviously you will need dog food. The most common dog food is dry biscuits but some dogs would like differnet food EG: Chiken and Gravy is probably the 2cnd most common for dogs. If your dog is young make sure you get them little bones to help there teeth but if there big get them a big bone.

Dry biscuits

chicken and gravy

steak and gravy

chicken, gravy and biscuits

Small bones

Big bones
